posts.title: Money Filled Duck Soap Bar
posts.content: Make bath time go a little smoother in your household by bribing the kids with this money filled duck soap bar. Shaped like a little yellow rubber duckie, each pearberry scented bar comes with either a $1, $5, $10, or $50 realistic faux bill.

posts.title: Get Shit Done Motivational Poster
posts.content: Nothing will provide you with the incentive to finally get your lazy ass off the couch quite like the  “Get Shit Done” motivational poster.  With a clear, concise slogan printed using contrasting colors to make the message pop, it’s perfect for reaching today’s apathetic youth.

posts.title: 360 Degree Radar Detector
posts.content: Decrease the likelihood of getting pulled over by outfitting your ride with this 360 degree radar detector. It comes with front and rear antennas that rapidly scan in all directions and features a pre-loaded database filled with  red light and speed camera locations.

posts.title: Convertible Bench To Table
posts.content: This convertible bench to table’s versatile design lets you go from a sturdy table to a comfy bench in mere seconds. It features a tough  all-weather design that requires no maintenance and forms a full 6 person table when 2 halves are placed side by side.

posts.title: Mini Burger Machine
posts.content: Gorge yourself on mouth-watering sliders whenever the craving strikes using the mini burger machine. The die-cast aluminum plates are specially designed to make six perfectly shaped sliders you can customize with your favorite toppings.

posts.title: Digital Measuring Cup Scale
posts.content: Bring your cookware into the digital age with this precise digital measuring cup scale. Whether you want to measure liquids, powders, or <del>even drugs</del> chopped up foods, the digital measuring cup will accurately display the relevant unit of measurement.

posts.title: Light Up Planters
posts.content: Bring your garden up to speed with the modern world with these super bright light up planters. Each one of these planters has fifteen LEDs inside that combine for a powerful glowing light that easily make your garden area look sleek and modern.

posts.title: Passback Practice Football
posts.content: Work on the fundamentals in your spare time by throwing this passback practice football against a flat wall. The unique half-shape of the football makes it spiral back towards you, making it great for strengthening your throwing muscles.

posts.title: Dual Temperature Control Mattress Pad
posts.content: With this dual temperature control mattress pad you and your significant other will be able to sleep in total comfort all night long. The pad allows you to set two different temperatures so that each person can comfortably sleep at their ideal temperature.

posts.title: You Are A Badass Book
posts.content: Life’s too short to live unhappy – so create the life you’ve always envisioned by reading “You Are A Badass”. Renowned success coach Jen Sincero provides inspiring stories and helpful advice so you can end self-doubt and become the best version of you.

posts.title: Chewbacca Seatbelt Cover
posts.content: Set your geeky ride apart from the rest by spicing up its decor using this Chewbacca seatbelt cover. Handmade from faux fur and high quality marine vinyl, it’s UV resistant and makes you look like a Wookie as you’re driving around town.

posts.title: Pug Mask
posts.content: It’s a dog eat dog world – so dress accordingly by wearing this realistic pug mask. This hilarious looking mask comes covered in faux fur and features an independent mouth piece that moves when you talk so you can live the pug life.
